The pure class interface. 
public class ShuffleTensor
  extends Shuffle
A shuffle which is the tensor of two shuffles. If f : WX and f : YZ then fg : WYXZ.

Author:
Alan Jeffrey
Version: v1.0 1998/06/03

public ShuffleTensor(Shuffle f,
                     Shuffle g);
